mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_DICT
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
dict_key = #{dict_key,jdbcType=varchar},
dict_type = #{dict_type,jdbcType=char},
dict_name = #{dict_name,jdbcType=varchar},
dict_desc = #{dict_desc,jdbcType=varchar},
default_value = #{default_value,jdbcType=varchar},
from_table = #{from_table,jdbcType=varchar},
use_column = #{use_column,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_parents = #{guid_parents,jdbcType=varchar},
seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=decimal},
ismulti = #{ismulti,jdbcType=char}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
